name: cl_Tower (One Script Jam)
description:
Climb to the top of Green Tower using abilities you find along the way. However, there's a twist: you can only carry one at a time! Better be ready to..... leave something behind!!!!!

Controls: 
ESC - Quit
WASD - Move
Space - Use Ability

Made for One Script Jam, with the theme "Leave something behind." There is only one script in the game, and the only things that have it as a component are the player and the ability pickups.

  • Credits are at the end (as shown in screenshots).
  • The assets folder of the project is in the Downloads, for proof.
    • The project's script is also included in Downloads on its own.

Further development would include ways for each ability to get through any given part, which would make leaving something behind more of a decision rather than a necessity.
Also, making the area horizontal as opposed to vertical would allow for much more variety in what the player can do.
